Most Illustrious Sir

Having the citizen Serafim da Silva Ribeiro offered for military service one of his sons named Vasco Ribeiro da Silva, and having to present him by the 25th of the coming month, Your Excellency therefore commands Your Lordship to do so promptly.

God keep Your Lordship  
General Headquarters in Bagé, November 30, 1841.  
Citizen Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães, General Commander of Police of the Boqueirão department.  
Serafim Joaquim de Alencastre, 1st Deputy of the General Chief of the Army General Staff

Presidency Secretariat of the Republic  
Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães, General Chief of Police of the Boqueirão department.  
From the 1st Deputy of the General Chief of the Army General Staff.

Office of the 1st Deputy of the General Chief of the Army General Staff, dated December 30, received on the 5th of the same month, January 5, concerning the son of Serafim Ribeiro.
